authors: Licursi V, Anzellotti S, Favaro J, Sineri S, Carucci N, Cundari E, Fiore M, Guarguaglini G, Pippa S, Nisi PS, Vernì F, Biagioni S, Cacci E, Amendola R, Lupo G, Negri R. 2020.
title: X-ray irradiated cultures of mouse cortical neural stem/progenitor cells recover cell viability and proliferation with dose-dependent kinetics.
